metadata.title: CVE-2015-3835 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in the OMXNodeInstance::emptyBuffer function inomx/OMXNodeInstance.cpp in libstagefright in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48Iallows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted application, akainternal bug 20634516.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
